tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: It was our first experience with a pediatric dentist and I couldn't be more pleased.  My 6 year old son had to undergo root canal procedure and Dr. Dhanraaj was very patient and gentle with him. He explained the process and answered all our questions which put us at ease. Most importantly, my son felt very comfortable with him as he kept explaining every  step as the procedure was being performed. Dr. Dhanraaj even gave my son a gift at the review visit, which, I felt was a nice touch. I highly recommend Dr. Dhanraaj if you are looking for a pediatric dentist.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Wisdom Tooth Extraction,Metallic Crown Fixing,
review: Excellent work done by Dr.Dhanraj. This is the first time we approached dentist for our child. Initially we were in confusion and wondering that child is really required to go through the treatment. But after visited multiple clinics. We feel our child is getting proper treatment here. We believe in Doctor's treatment. We did RC and one tooth extraction. The process looks tedious, but the way he handling children is good. My son didn't react much while giving local anesthesia. I request everyone to get second opinion and you could see the difference with other clinics. I strongly recommend this Doctor for kids treatment.

review: This is our second visit to the doc. He is a warm and friendly person who made my daughter to feel at ease throughout the procedure. Now her dental visits have become a very comfortable one. tags: None
review:
We had to wait for 30 mins beyond the appointment time though we reached 10 mins prior to the appointment slot.
While entering clinic footwear should be removed itseems, Since my kid was 4 yrs we made her not to remove her chappals. But as soon as the doctor arrived he literally shouted arrogantly at the receptionist that slippers are not allowed inside clinic. We felt totally embarrassed and left the clinic immediately without consulting. We didn't expect such arrogant behaviour from a doctor.
reply_text: Thanks for your valuable feedback.Sir..As per norms,the maximum waiting time is 30 minutes from the scheduled time..For eg..if booked for 10.15,our doctors will consult  within the stipulated time period.As per your feedback the doctor came before 30 minutes to attend your child.Removal of footwear outside clinic premises is a safety protocol followed in our clinic to prevent transmission of infection as we handle  infants and senior citizens as well..We care for the safety of every individual visiting our practice.The doctor did not personally communicate or interact with the patient in this regard..Instead he instructed (not shouted) his receptionist as it's the duty of our team to tell them to do so which was missed in your case.. Nevertheless,we apologise for instructing the receptionist in front of you if it has hurt you personally. We also inform that we couldn't avoid it as it's a matter of negligence on safety precautions in this regard.Best wishes for your good health..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very friendly with kids. My son felt comfortable visiting Dr. Dhanraj and we felt confident going in for a surgery after doctors detailed explanation.  The experience has made me to refer the clinic to my mom and we consulted Dr. Logarani at the same clinic. Two months after the surgery, the doctor still follows up about my son's oral health.  Thanks to him and his entire team at Dhaarini

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I was typically "searching" for a Pedo dentist for my daughter who is child friendly and Yes I found him. Thanks to Dr. Dhanraj and also to Mam. Both were really very friendly and most importantly doc explained clearly about the treatment well before.
Wait time - there is nothing as such. Get an appointment, u be there on time and u can meet the doc on time! Clinic completely is so clean and my daughter calls it a "Toy" hospital 😉. The followups call from docs are much appreciated. Overall was a good experience and would definitely recommend to others.
